value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Listen up, everyone. I've gotten
word that the Emblian Empire has
invaded the World of Mystery.$k$pThey're seizing control of its Heroes
in hopes of using them to mount
an attack on our kingdom.$k$pUnfortunately, they already possess
one of that world's most important
Heroes—Marth!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|The legendary Hero-King?$k$p$EFace_Anger|If Marth leads a charge on the
Askran Kingdom, it would be
devastating.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|Well, so what if they have a legend
on their side? We have one too.
Our summoner here!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Let's go to the World of Mystery and
free their Heroes from Embla's
control before things get out of hand.$k$p$EFace_Cool|It's going to be a tough battle.
I hope you're ready for this,
$Nu.$k

$WmMPID_マルス,ch01_00_Marth_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I am Marth, Prince of Altea.
You must be with the Order of
Heroes I've heard about.$k$pPrincess Veronica told us about you.
And I assume you know all about
the contract that binds us to her?$k$pHeroes of a conquered world must
obey their conqueror.$k$pBut if you show us that you're
more powerful than our conqueror,
that will break the contract.$k$pThat being said, we will battle our
very best. Now, show us what
you can do!$k$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_マルス,ch01_00_Marth_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Well done. I expected as much
from you. But our battles are
far from over.$k$pThe next time you see me, we will
settle this once and for all.$k$Sbs150|
